metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19721 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: An off-by-one error in the DecodeBlock function in codec/sdl_image.c in VideoLAN VLC media player before 3.0.9 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted image file. NOTE: this may be related to the SDL_Image product.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
